website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy rack with a tight grid and tall feet, so food cools quickly and small items don't slip through the grate.
pros: The 6 feet stand 1" tall, for quick cooling
Oven safe up to 575°F, it doubles as a roasting rack, and the stainless steel construction prevents rust
cons: Although it's dishwasher safe, food can get stuck in the tight grid, and sponges may snag on the wire edges

customer_reviews.title: Almost all stainless steel.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cooling rack because of the description that it was stainless steel, and would be easy to clean and take care of. When I received the product, I found that only the supporting framework is stainless steel. The wire mesh on top appears to be a coated wire mesh and not real stainless steel. It's hard to wash because the coating on the wire mesh is rough and sponges get snagged in the rough parts. I used the rack today and it works well cooling baked goods seem to get stuck to the wire mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Bolles

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a rack you can actually BAKE on
customer_reviews.text: We have tried a lot of different racks in the past even after seeing reviews that suggested they might not be good for baking, only cooling. I was very happy to find this one that can do both! Even better, it was suggested by a youtuber that focuses on Sous Vide (Sous Vide Everything). He uses it with clips to hold vacuum sealed bags with food in place within the water bath. Meaning, this has held up well for baking, cooling and being used under water. For the price, you can't beat this rack! And just a tip, when you bake something on it, spray some cooking spray on it and it cleans up pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived bent with one of the welds on one of the wires broken. Not worth the hassle of sending in back so will just live with it. Really tired of buying "junk" off of Amazon and this was a best seller product. Find myself going back to brick and mortar stores for more purchases.
customer_reviews.author: StuckInCT

customer_reviews.title: Used one time and the support "leg" on one end broke
customer_reviews.text: In theory this is a good rack, it looks good, its looks solid, it looks like it can do the job. looks are not everything in this world nor are, it seems all the 5 star ratings I see on Amazon. Regardless the main issue is the first time this was used to cool Christmas cookies the bottom leg's "welds" gave way and it is now a tripod for support. not worth the trouble to send back so a little craft wire has made the rack at least serviceable but its a disappointment. Buy at your own risk, maybe I just got one on a bad day.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Fits in the Back and Decker Wide toaster perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be a crisper rack to fit in my new Black and Decker Wide counter top oven. Fits perfect. Lets the convection heat surround the food. Spay with oil and the food wont stick.
customer_reviews.author: sherriemyers

customer_reviews.title: Rusty Rack
customer_reviews.text: Found out the item is rusty after opening the package. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tao Qian

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst items ever purchased from Amazon. First rack came and the support leg on the bottom was not welded properly. Returned and asked for a replacement, when the replacement came another leg on the bottom was not attached. Obviously they have significant quality control problems. Horrible product.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: The first time I used it the wire foot broke off!
customer_reviews.text: I used this baking rack one time and one of the wire feet broke. It was obviously a Bad weld. Poor qualityControl. The seller would not replace the broken item so I returned them and I will buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie L.

customer_reviews.title: Caution, Reconsider!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective. After reading other reviews, I note that my defective cooling rack is defective in the very same places. That is, the feet are bent & misaligned. And, there is a welding defect in the very same spot. It's pretty evident that this seller is distributing known defective merchandise. I would suggest you look elsewhere for first-quality goods. Especially at this $29.95 price!
customer_reviews.author: HistoryChef

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC! You will be very happy with this cooling rack!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with the Ultra Cuisine wire cooling rack! Thank goodness I didn't buy the one that was so highly recommended by America's Test Kitchen since it had such bad reviews. This one is extremely sturdy with 1cm-spaced wires (pictured) and it has the clipped ends filed off (pictured) so there are no sharp edges. It fits perfectly with its rounded corners in ATK's highly recommended Nordic Ware's 1/2 sheet pan (pictured) - which I would also highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D. V. Guenther

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Ultra Cuisine Stainless Steel Cooling Rack for Baking fits Jelly Roll Sheet Pan - Heavy Duty Wire Grid for Cookies, Cakes and Bread - Oven Safe for Roasting, Cooking, Grilling, Drying I am especially pleased with three things regarding this item: 1) The quality and size of this Stainless steel Rack. 2) The quick shipping and careful packaging. 3) The Customer service and guarantee of satisfaction.There is an Iron clad risk free Guarantee through this company. Nice product that definitely fulfills the purpose I required it for.
customer_reviews.author: Joal

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMMERCIAL GRADE AS STATED
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A BASIC RACK THAT IS SOLD ANYWHERE . IT IS NOT HEAVY ENOUGH FOR COMMERCIAL DUTY . VERY DISAPPOINTED ! IT WILL DO FOR EVERYDAY COOKING JOBS , BUT WILL NOT DO BIG VOLUME COOKING . THE PRICE IS BUMPED UP FOR THAT COMMERCIAL WORDING IN AD . THIS SHOULD BE PRICED AT ABOUT TEN DOLLARS NOT $20.00 .
customer_reviews.author: PAMB.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my husband has decided to start cooking (should never have insisted on viewing Julie and Julia) in our retirement, and he wants to have all the special equipment. We had lost my previous cooking rack in a move, but since I have been cooking since I was 8 years old, I have learned to make do with what is available. Anyway, we have used it for several purposes including cooling baked goods, draining poached fruit, etc., and it has worked well and been easy to clean. It is also a really good size for various purposes and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Lady

customer_reviews.title: damaged when received
customer_reviews.text: When I received, wire rack bent, some wires broke, threw it to the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing—One rack came apart after only a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these racks until this morning when I noticed that one rack had come apart. They were a recent purchase and I’ve only used them a few times, mostly for cooling baked goods. I expected them to be sturdier than this. This turned out to be a disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: FL Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Bacon rack
customer_reviews.text: I went through a phase where I was making a lot more breakfast for more people at home and was cooking a lot of bacon. I normally will cook it on the stove but I was not able to produce enough bacon fast enough. I began baking them in the oven and I also enjoy them more when baked but I didn't have a rack so I was just laying them in the cookie sheet on foil. This rack is great, it's easy to wash, it allowed the bacon grease to drip through so my bacon could crisp better. Basically a no brainer purchase. I've used and washed the rack numerous times and has not rusted or anything.
customer_reviews.author: tubuochen

customer_reviews.title: One Broken support when delivered
customer_reviews.text: Just received this cooling rack in a total intact box. Upon removing the plastic wrap to wash as advised, one side of one support is unwelded and flopping. Not worth the hassle of returning, so will keep, but, buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Rodi

customer_reviews.title: Best Baking/Cooling, all-purpose rack ever!
customer_reviews.text: Had no idea that there were different types of racks. Now I know...I followed Michelle Tam's (Nom Nom Paleo) link to this rack, read the reviews and ordered. I have thrown out many racks over the years and don't expect to be doing that any more. I followed Tam's advice and soaked the rack upside down in the pan while we ate our fabulous fajitas. Clean-up was a breeze. This is the only rack I will purchase in the future, thinking about getting the slighty smaller one, 10 x 14.75. Update: No more thinking about it, went ahead and ordered the smaller rack.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Thin wire legs
customer_reviews.text: Received with broken leg on the bottom of the tray
customer_reviews.author: Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for anything you need to put in the oven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack on the recommendation of a popular cook on Youtube who uses them (or one like this) for more even cooking and ease of cleanup. It has met or exceeded all my expectations, from how it cooks to cleanup. Fits perfectly inside my currently baking sheets, is durable and cleans up like a breeze still looks brand new. I put a layer of tin foil under it in the sheet when in the oven. I have done everything from vegetables, steaks, chicken, bacon, cinnamon toast, etc. You can scrub it, but I just throw it in the dishwasher and every time it comes out looking new.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great racks in my air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for what I wanted them for! I wanted additional racks in my Instant Omni (which Instant does not seem to sell). The 14.75 x 10 was the exact size I needed. The oven rack is 14.75. They are a bit shallower than the original rack, but they work great. It gives me an additional rack for air frying or dehydrating. The small grid pattern ensures nothing falls through the cracks. The heavy guage allows for the high heat of the oven. Great product. The photo shows two of these racks and the original oven rack in the center for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but I'm Returning
customer_reviews.text: This product has great reviews and is indeed a quality product. I respectfully disagree that it is commercial grade, however. It turns out this 11.5" x 16.5" half sheet rack weighs in at a mere 1.08 lbs. We used Vollrath products in culinary school so I looked it up. The Vollrath 20248 (also a 11.5" x 16.5 half sheet rack) weighs in at 1.95 lbs. Almost double the weight using the same 18/8 stainless steel! The price is equivalent between the two, so the Ultra Cuisine is going back and the Vollrath is coming in. If commercial quality is not important to you, the Ultra Cuisines will do great. For me, gimme the Vollrath!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: A solid wire rack
customer_reviews.text: A great restaurant quality commercial duty wire rack. It is a standard size and works great for cooling baked goods and roasting. Easy clean up. I would recommend hand wish only so the dish soap does not tarnish the finish. My wife had some cheapie "dollar store" special whimpy wire racks and I replaced those flimsy things with a couple of these real wire racks. We have been using these for over 3 years and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooling rack!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all. This one is sturdy and cleans up easily in the dishwasher. My older racks from another company were coated and looked nice at first. The coating started flaking off and the wire underneath began rusting. Being stainless steel, this rack has no problems and they fit the half baking sheets perfectly. I use these in baking sheets to cook steaks (to about 125 degrees and finish on the grill or in a skillet) and fish sticks and baked potatoes. I also use these to cool pies and cookies and home made bread.
customer_reviews.author: David Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality, Perfect Size, Sturdy and a Good Value
customer_reviews.text: These racks are a nice quality and will hopefully last for years. The size fits perfectly in a half sheet pan and the third pair of legs adds to stability. The reason for a 4 instead of 5 star review is because they have a slight upward bow as mentioned in other reviews. I suspect that this will flatten over time as the metal adjusts to the weight of the hot pans cooling on top. Glad to have racks that can be used for cooling and roasting. Glad these are part of my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products. Company responds to customer questions within 24 to 48 hours. The staff os very helpful. I asked them what a Jelly roll pan size they recommend for their racks. The response was as follows... “Our Jelly Roll racks work great with any 10x15 to 11x16 sized baking pan. These pans will be called Jelly Roll baking pans/trays. Please let me know if there is anything else that we can help with!“ I definitely recommend buying products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Makes bacon great!
customer_reviews.text: The main reason for buying this was to make bacon. I’ve started to make the bacon in the oven and before we bought this, it would just sit in the grease and soak up too much grease. Now, I love bacon grease but once it sits in it for so long, it’s juat too much. This allows the grease to drip down and not soak into the actual bacon. Works great! I clean it immediately so it’s been easy to clean. I don’t know how easy it would be to clean if you leave things on there for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Randall and Bart Foster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cooling rack, great height for air circulation
customer_reviews.text: When the day calls for a fresh batch of homemade cookies, this cooling rack from Ultra Cuisine is perfect. Place them cookies hot from the oven onto the rack - the height allows air to circulate beneath to give each cookie the perfect crisp. Can't wait to try this rack to bake bacon next.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleV

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a baking or cooling rack
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent rack set for both baking for a cooling. We originally were considering getting a Air Fryer but opted for these instead as they help produce better cooking results in your own oven (no need for an extra appliance). The size 11.8" x 16.9" wasn't a perfect fit for our two large cooking sheets. The width was just right but the length was a bit too long. So these racks sit higher on one side than the other while in our cooking sheets. Cleaning them does require some type of stiff scrub brush as food can get baked into the cross-joints on both sides of the rack. These are a great addition to any kitchen for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Harbour D

customer_reviews.title: Very solid
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait a bit before writing a review to see how this stood up. I have used it for prep, cooling, draining, cooking. It is a nice wire rack. I would like to have gotten a twin pack for this price. No signs of wear which is what you want in a stainless steel item. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Fredo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!! No rust!! The PERFECT rack!
customer_reviews.text: I had other racks and when they were washed in the dishwasher they'd come out with orange rust on the underside where the wires crossed. Not these! They have been perfect in the oven, in the dishwasher, no sharp edges, solid and durable, no bending and have come in very handy now that I've mastered instant homemade doughnut holes with few ingredients durning 'stay at home' this spring!! Buy this, it performs exactly they way you need it to.
customer_reviews.author: DAK

customer_reviews.title: Solid Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: These racks will be used mostly as warming racks on an outdoor griddle. I've used them twice for bacon and they are just what I wanted. I'm sure I'll come up with other uses for them with my outdoor cooking, thinking jerky right now. No rack is easy to clean but these are dishwasher safe and easy to fit into the dishwasher!! They are heavy duty and very well made. They are stable on the griddle and very rigid. I doubt that they would "warp" if used in the oven. Overall,very happy, just what I wanted and met all of my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Martin H JacobyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and the Right Type of Stainless Steel!
customer_reviews.text: I received both the half and quarter sheet Ultra Cuisine Cooling and Baking Racks a couple of days ago and have a chance to try them both out already. The quality, the heavier weight, welds, fit size, and type of stainless steel #304 is excellent. I am very pleased and will buy these again. I'm using these in Nordic Ware aluminum sheet pans for oven baking and they fit perfectly. I just take a bit of olive oil on the wire mesh and it works. No warping, not sticking, and no hassle. Looks like these will last a very long time maybe to be passed on for generations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly as advertised. Unfortunately, they are literally 1/16th of an inch too wide too nicely fit inside the Instant Omni Plus oven. My remedy is to (with great force) slightly bend them in the middle so that they can slide in a little easier. Unfortunately, due to the interior design of the oven I can only use them on the very top and very bottom tracks. Other than that, there's nothing wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: First I'd like to know what "warmth' category in the review ratings mean. LOL! These work perfect for what I wanted. They are study and fit great in my sheet pans. You can put your chicken on the racks in the oven and it crisps up great on both sides.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mowery

customer_reviews.title: Great item...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, heavy gauge stainless rack fits perfectly in a half sheet pan and sits about an inch above the bottom of the pan. Perfect for ribs, wings or larger items that are baked. Use non stick cooking spray for faster clean up, especially for foods that have a glaze or sauce. Great size to use as a cooling rack and due to the grid, marks are not left on goods that are cooled. Would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a first time purchase or replacement baking/cooling rack.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette B Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Met all expectations
customer_reviews.text: I use these "cooling" racks to make jerky in a Weber kettle outdoor grill. They are very sturdy and will last for the rest of my life. Best way to clean them is to just pop them into the dishwasher of the pots and pan cycle and they clean up beautifully. I only buy stainless steel accessories for my charcuterie projects so that I'll never have to worry about rust.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this wire rack
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this wire rack. I used it to make beef jerky in the oven. I sprayed a light coat of canola oil on it prior to placing the beef on it. Clean up was very easy, mostly came clean with dish soap and dish rag, which by the way did not snag on any sharp wire edges as has been the case with other racks I've used. I used a toothbrush for debris on a few of the wire joints but even that took very little brushing. I really like the grid size, the rack definitely feels like it could handle a good sized roast. I am seriously considering buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Silver

customer_reviews.title: Superb and Sturdy Cookie Cooling Rack!!
customer_reviews.text: I love baking and this is the first cooling rack I own! So far have used it to make a few dozen of different types of cookies, and it has worked wonderfully! 😋
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: So much better than non-stick.
customer_reviews.text: I had a few non-stick wire racks and had nothing but problems. Definitely not non-stick, tough to clean, and the coating wore off very quickly. At that point I decided to just go with plain stainless. Surprise, they're better in every way. Even easier to clean, surprisingly. We'll see about any rust issues moving forward, but after half a dozen uses I'm very happy we splurged on some nicer wire racks.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Superior Cooling & Baking Rack
customer_reviews.text: We just started using this Ultra Cuisine 100% Stainless Steel Cooling and Baking Rack, and we are extremely happy and impressed with it's professional appearance, sturdiness and versatility. We have been using it as a draining rack, on the counter, for delicate glasses, and it has been perfect for that. We will definitely be ordering another one shortly, to use as a cooling cake rack. Thrilled to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: mtlgal

customer_reviews.title: Food sticks to it!
customer_reviews.text: Bacon sticks a lot to this rack. It is wood be extremely difficult and very time consuming to get it clean off of all the individual squares. Not work the work it takes each time to clean.
customer_reviews.author: ltlhoot

customer_reviews.title: These are just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to put in half-sheet rimmed cookie pans. I'm using these to put my orchids on. I fill the tray with water as a supplement source of humidity for the orchids. I already had 3 others similar to these that I've owned for many years and they are great. I particularly like the fact that if you make small cookies, the small holes in the cooling racks don't allow them to sag through the holes like some less expensive cooling racks with bigger holes.
customer_reviews.author: Aprille

customer_reviews.title: It's a solid choice
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly to bake french fries in my oven; they cook much more evenly on this than an aluminum baking sheet and I dont have to go through the trouble of flipping them. That said, this "stainless steel" is slightly magnetic, so I'm not convinced that its true 18/8; either that or the manufacturing process just isn't quite perfect. Either way, it seems fine and I have washed it once in the dish washer and it came out fine, so I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Quality rack
customer_reviews.text: got this for oven use. Not disappointed! Bacon cooked great. Clean up a breeze. Also did chicken when we got rained out from grilling. Sturdy. Arrived on date promised. I have to get a few more, as hubby says it will work for jerky making. Disappointed no pdf was sent it included like it said in offer.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling rack.  I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, sturdy, cooling rack. I like the 1 inch high legs that allow for more air circulation underneath for cooling. In our home we bake bread and rolls daily. Other brands of racks we have had in the past were too short, flimsy and bowed in the middle. I am very impressed with this rack and would definitely buy again. The rack arrived quickly, well packaged with no problems. Great seller. I highly recommend this rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the tight weave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rack mainly to roast a chicken on, placing it in a cooking sheet not realizing that the tight weave means more surface for chicken drippings to get stuck on. It was extremely difficult to clean. As a cooling rack, it works as well as any cooling rack could.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: These racks were small for the dimensions of the pans they were advertised to fit and left a big gap between the perimeter of the rack and pan. The cross bar with feet is only attached to the outside frame of the baking rack and doesn't touch the grid above to support it. The grid and frame are not thick as described and seem flimsy. Returned this set and opted for stainless steel baking racks by Kitchenatics that were better for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Jung

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in Half Sheet pan
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this rack about two years. No rust. It cleans well, fits well in the Nordic half sheet pan. I use it to drain dishes, cool baked goods, and roast "oven fried" chicken.
customer_reviews.author: TwinsForMeToday

customer_reviews.title: Baking bacon
customer_reviews.text: I use these primarily for baking bacon. They are perfect for 4 strips of bacon each. A bit smaller than your typical cookie sheet, but I think that's a good thing as it makes it easier for the baking sheet to catch the grease from the bacon. Some difficulty cleaning the cross-hatch pattern unless you have a brush that can get into all the little nooks and crannies.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first with no pan. I liked it so much I bought another with the pan because the first one didn't fit in my own pan.
customer_reviews.author: MDM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baking wings, bacon, etc. in the oven.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two (One at a mega discount store) and this one. This one CAN be used in the oven, which is what I was looking for. The cheap one is only a cooling rack and cannot be used in the oven. This baking rack is great on my cookie sheet. I baked chicken wings and bacon in the oven on this and both turned out perfect, crispy like I wanted. I will be buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Easter

customer_reviews.title: Great size & stability
customer_reviews.text: The pan sizing is fantastic and the stability is great. I got this primarily because my old cooling racks were bending under weight of breads that I’ve been cooling post-baking and first time through it held shapes of my loaves perfectly. Big fan so far!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Winder

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've learned that a quality cooling rack is well worth the purchase price. This rack is simple but well-made. The quality of the rack is excellent in my opinion. One acid test of a cooling rack is to use is for baking bacon in my 400° oven. After baking 4.5lbs of thick sliced bacon on this rack, I was impressed with the easy cleanup and the fact that the rack came out like new. No discoloration, easy cleanup and it keeps it's shape. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Already rusting!
customer_reviews.text: Overall these cooling racks are sturdy and working great until I realized they are already rusting. I've only used them a couple of time and they are already rusting, definitely not worth the price I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best brand of racks!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite brand of baking racks! I’ve tried other brands but they rust really easily after one good soak. Not this one though! I have smaller sizes and love how they clean really easily and there are no sharp corners that make drying it off a pain (towels catching or ripping). There are lots of brands to choose from but this should be your first and only choice!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t rust and sturdy! Top notch
customer_reviews.text: I had a rack from Costco (as part of a Nordic Ware set) and it rusted in no time so I needed a replacement. I’ve been using the racks to cook my bacon strips and I’m so happy with them! I put the racks in the dishwasher after use and they come out good as new! Also, they’re very sturdy. Not cheap but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: this S.S. cooling rack is the best for any pastry’s I am using to cure sausage it works well for what I do
customer_reviews.author: jean wodzinski

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking bacon
customer_reviews.text: I used these on a foil lined sheet pan to bake bacon in the oven. I inverted the second rack upside down on top of the bacon on the lower rack. The bacon turned out perfect and stayed flat. The racks cleaned up with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Deon Corkins

customer_reviews.title: A good, sturdy rack
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this rack. I replaced a flimsier one with this and I'm glad I did. It fits well in my pan, and it also functions as a trivet for my counter when something hot comes out of the oven. It's everything I need and I will get a lot of use out of it. It cleans up easily and I really like the solid feel. I am also very happy with the seller, who reached out with a follow-up email. I always appreciate this because it shows that they care about their products and their business, and I feel confident that they would offer great customer service if needed. I would not hesitate to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: the real deal.
customer_reviews.text: Real stainless not cheap chrome plated. If you hand wash these with a non alkali detergent they will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: wmcs

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Well Priced
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for these racks to fit standard 1/2 baking tray we have had for some time. Took a gamble on it and ordered a pair... well priced, it fit perfectly, well built, durable, and worked great. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike James

customer_reviews.title: Best rack you can find!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this rack! It is extremely sturdy and well worth the price! I have tried other and either they would bend or they would rust. You don’t have to worry about either one of those things happening with this rack! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shaller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, very happy with purchase. Use all the time for baking and cooling.
customer_reviews.author: S. Redd

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: I have used it to bake chicken wings, it allows the heat to get under the wings so you don't really need to turn them to get crispy skin. Plus they fit my Nordic Ware half sheet pan perfectly. Have only washed in dishwasher a couple times, but it seems to be fine without any rust.
customer_reviews.author: M3 Pete

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these racks because of the higher temperature rating and the fact that they can both cook and cool. Very satisfied. I love making wings and I wanted to speed up the process by having multiple racks cooking at the same time on higher temperatures (450) in a convection oven. i have three racks now and I can cook about fifty wings at a time. All I have to do now is make my sauces close to the timer setting. I did not spray the racks the first time I used it, but learned that clean up is quicker if you do so.
customer_reviews.author: kappaman82

customer_reviews.title: Ultra Cuisine Baking Racks are Ultra Special
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the roasting racks in my three large roasting pans and settled on these Ultra Cuisine Stainless Steel racks. I could not be more pleased. They are well designed, heavy and attractive. Most importantly, they will not rust. A perfect upgrade for my busy kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Fords4ever

customer_reviews.title: Kinda Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Other than the price, this would be a five-star product. With that said, after ordering one, I ordered another....just because I know that I will never need to buy another cooling rack. ( Unless I accidentally drop one and step on it) The craftsmanship and quality of these cooling racks are 5-star.
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second one that I have ordered. I absolutely Love these cooling racks they are so sturdy and so easy to clean. I don’t like the cooling racks with any type of coating on them, they peel and just don’t stand the test of time. I have used them in the oven to baked chicken, jalapeño stuffed peppers, also done brown sugar maple bacon.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and proper size
customer_reviews.text: This product perfectly fits my vikingware 1/2 sheets. The feet are much sturdier than the last racks I purchased from Walmart. The product is true stainless steel -- not coated low-quality steel like other products. I use these almost daily in my kitchen and after 6 months they are still like new.
customer_reviews.author: SPB

customer_reviews.title: Third time's the charm!
customer_reviews.text: Had to order three times, but finally found a sturdy jelly roll pan! Impressive pan!
customer_reviews.author: K. B. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: You NEED these
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for an oven-safe rack for some time now and my mom purchased this for me for Christmas. This is definitely a staple in anyone's kitchen! I put it in the dishwasher to clean and it seems to have held up nicely so far. The only reason I give 4 stars is because it doesn't fit my standard sized baking sheet (purchased from Walmart) perfectly. One end is slightly elevated because the sheet is about half an inch too short and the rack sits on the edge of the handle. BUT this would not deter me from purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, sturdy cooking/ decorating rack
customer_reviews.text: This stainless steel wire rack fits perfectly into a 1/4 sheet pan. It cleans easily in the dishwasher; I’ve washed it by hand once; in the dishwasher twice- and has held up well with no rusting, peeling, etc. I would recommend this product for roasting meats, or icing single- serve desserts, cookies, strawberries so that extra frosting drips away. Nice sturdy weight. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Diane T.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and as I don't do a lot in the kitchen I don't use them but she says they are great! They fit her quarter and half sheet pans perfectly. They are well made and sturdier than I expected. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: mark g

customer_reviews.title: Warps in oven
customer_reviews.text: When removing this pan from a hot oven it buckled with such force it knocked my arm against the oven door causing a significant burn. It warps at normal oven temperatures too.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M. Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly sturdy baking racks. I bought them to replace ones that had rusted in the dishwasher, even though they had been labeled dishwasher safe. I use them to cool cookies, reheat slices of pizza (air flow under the crust helps crisp it), ice cakes. These are a worthwhile investment and a great addition to your baking tools.
customer_reviews.author: Lemons2Lemonade

customer_reviews.title: This works wonderfully!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this cooling/baking rack. A recipe for Eggplant Parmesan called for the use of a baking rack in a pan to help brown and cook the sliced through before adding the sauce and cheese. I tried it that way and the slices came out breautufully lightly browned all over. I look forward to using this item again and again. Thank you for caring enough to make something that works so well!!!
customer_reviews.author: ABB

customer_reviews.title: The very best baking/cooling rack.
customer_reviews.text: I love this baking rack. It’s stainless steel and will not rust. I bought another rack that was non-sticking and put it in the dishwasher and rust spots showed up everywhere. Stainless steel won’t rust and dishwasher safe, easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Julia G Lange

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use these for baking but they’re really great when making chicken wings in the oven! Wire racks are easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: SMarsh

customer_reviews.title: This rack is extremely sturdy, doesn't rust, and very food safe.
customer_reviews.text: Baking Normandy Blend mixed vegetables with added herbs and a little oil. It is also good for baking and browning chicken wings, breasts, etc. Of course it is also great for cooling baked goods. I'm sure there are many more uses that other customers can think of. As you can see, I'm very pleased with this rack and happy I chose it from all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Jean

customer_reviews.title: Clean as a whistle in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: I got the racks a week ago and have only used it so far for cooking bacon in the oven. Imagine the grease, grime and crusty bits on the rack! One run through the dishwasher, and they came out perfectly clean. They are sturdily made and fit well on a baking sheet. This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L Slater

customer_reviews.title: A must have for bakers!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Exactly what I needed for cooling baked cakes and cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Cooling rack 100% 10/8 stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: These are great, wonderful, they have the center brace and holes are close together so cookies cool great and meat roast great on top of it. I do soak them and clean them by hand, but that is just me. I wash my dishes before I put them into the dishwasher. They do come so clean and easy with a little dawn and sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki & Chaz Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These fit the jelly roll size aluminum pans we have perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: After much debate, I ended up buying this one instead of a cheaper one and I'm very glad I did. It's absolutely worth every penny. It's high quality metal, dishwasher safe, and has helped me roast chicken in the oven and cool loaves of bread all the same with no signs of wear. This will probably last me the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: The rack was commercial grade quality, very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Rack for my baking and candy projects. I have been wanting a good quality rack for a long time. I went on Amazon and researched all they had available and chose "Ultra Cuisine" 100% 304 Stainless Steel Cooling and Baking Rack. It was great that it could be used in the oven also and that it could hold a substantial amount of weight as a Trivet. The rack that I had previously been using did not have the grid pattern and warm cookies would slide through and break. I am impressed with the quality of my new baking rack. Thank you! And that you for the cook book, I was elated.
customer_reviews.author: Kristee

customer_reviews.title: Great baking product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product with on exception. When cleaning do not use dishwasher on sheet pan. I did and it discolored it. The stainless steel rack was fine in the dishwasher. The sheet pan is aluminum. Still this is a very good and heavy duty product.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Childers

customer_reviews.title: We use these constantly and not a spot of rust.
customer_reviews.text: We use these racks 2-3 times a week as cooling racks, baking racks, air drying in the fridge...and there isn't a spot of rust on them. We'll even let them soak for hours in the sink after baking with them and they are still just as good as the day we got them. They're champions. I HIGHLY recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: David Romney

customer_reviews.title: Superb cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: Love that I can feel that I can get it really clean via boiling water, dish washer or bleach - should that ever become necessitated. This is a nice large board, so that an onion c An be used in one spot, mushrooms another, peppers in a third...
customer_reviews.author: Village Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome results for the first use...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bake things that will come out crispy. Made tacos tonight and grabbed this rack at the last second to bake the taco shells. It worked amazingly!! Can't wait to try it out on other items in the future!! Without a steady hand, the taco shells really wanted to slide off the rack, but I don't view this as a design flaw-- the rack is versatile and I could have used the rack on top of a baking pan with a taller lip.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product from a reliable vendor!
customer_reviews.text: I received this rack right on time, as promised. It was received undamaged in excellent condition. I bake all my bread at home, and was looking for a multi-purpose rack of good quality. I was not disappointed! I have used it several times, and it is working very well for me! It is sturdy, and lifts bake goods sufficiently off a surface to cool completely without condensation on my baked product. It washes well in my dishwasher! I am completely satisfied with my purchase, and would definitely buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, good mesh
customer_reviews.text: This rack fits a half-sheet pan perfectly. The wire mesh is interwoven, sturdy, and allows good air flow. I am just having a bit of trouble keeping a "nice rack" pun out of this review.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Baked Bacon!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for baking bacon. It works like a charm. Other racks only have the wire going one direction, and that can be a pain to deal with when it comes to bacon. With the wire going both ways, this one is just perfect. It's not the easiest to clean with a bristle-style dish brush, but I've put it in the dishwasher, and it comes out perfectly clean, so I have no complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: battlewithin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and high quality cooling rack
customer_reviews.text: The rack size is perfect for your average half sheet pan. I love this thing, very high quality. Just purchased a new home and this is the perfect addition to the kitchen! Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cooling/cooking rack that fits half sheet pan
customer_reviews.text: It's a Wonderful cooling rack, I use it in the oven to cook bacon, my son likes to use it when he cooks Pizza, it's also great when you are frosting cinnamon rolls, Etc. I have not had a problem yet with this cooling rack, I will be ordering another one this week.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy But Not Stainfree
customer_reviews.text: The materials are good. Size is just right. Useful in many ways. I used it even for simple reheating. But hard to remove some stains: they stick and unremovable with discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: FriendsTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Wire Cooling Rack
customer_reviews.text: We recently baked outside in our Traeger Ironwood 650 pellet grill Toll House cookies and used the rack to cool them. We could get 20 large cookies on the rack at a time...very nice. The only improvement would be to made them out of 18/8 stainless as they'd be a tad more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need!
customer_reviews.text: We make baked chicken wings and bacon in the oven, so we needed a good grate to go in our sheet pans. These are exactly what we needed. Dishwasher safe, oven safe, and the grid is a good size so nothing falls through. Glad we found these!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this in the top rack of my dishwasher to cover plastic items to keep them from flipping over. So far it’s holding up well since it gets washed quite frequently.
customer_reviews.author: BMC New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Easy simple change to be healthier
customer_reviews.text: I use this rack practically everyday. I feel like my food cooks faster and more evenly. I bought this so I could cut more unnecessary fat from my families diet. I can spray the food lightly with an oil mist and it roasts in the oven, getting very crisp. It’s much better tasting and healthier than letting food items sit in oil as they cook.
customer_reviews.author: N. Theodosiou

product_meta.title: Ultra Cuisine 100% Stainless Steel Wire Cooling Rack for Baking fits Half Sheet Pans Cool Cookies, Cakes, Breads - Oven Safe for Cooking, Roasting, Grilling - Heavy Duty Commercial Quality
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY STRONG WIRE GRID - with small holes, smooth no-snag edges, and a full 1-inch height resulting in greater all-around air flow and even cooking and cooling every time

PROFESSIONAL GRADE 304 (18/8) STAINLESS STEEL - unlike other cheap racks made of iron covered with a coating of chrome, the Ultra Cuisine rack is 100 percent stainless steel, so there is no worry of rusting or chrome flaking off into your food. Ultra Cuisine racks are dishwasher-safe, oven-safe and offer long lasting superior quality

SAFE FOR OVEN USE TO 575F DEGREES - means you can use it confidently for roasting, baking, grilling, smoking, drying, and bbq. All this is possible due to the high heat tolerance of 100% stainless steel construction
PERFECT SIZE - to fit flat inside large 13” x 18” cookie half sheets without hanging over the pan edges like other racks that are just too long, causing uneven lop-sided cooking
READ REAL REVIEWS - from hundreds of satisfied customers and check out ALL the Ultra Cuisine brand “Special Offers and Product Promotions” below
